name: Drednaw
author: Dsuke
flavor_text: Drednaw lurks along the shoreline. When prey come to drink water, Drednaw stretches its neck out and chomps down on them.

abilities.name: Impervious Shell
abilities.effect: Prevent all damage done to this Pokémon by attacks from your opponent’s Pokémon if that damage is 200 or more.

attacks.name: Hard Crunch
attacks.effect: If your opponent’s Active Pokémon already has any damage counters on it, this attack does 80 more damage.
